column4: Okay, is it possible to go back to Gnome 2 with 11.04? I don't think I like this new interface
Okay will do... and just to check, is there a way to make that the default?
GDM should be able to do that yes
http://linuxlookup.com/howto/move_ubuntu_window_control_buttons_left_right_side for a gconftool string to run to move them
